name: n8n-nodes-base.emailReadImapTool
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

postProcessAction.name: postProcessAction
postProcessAction.description: What to do after the email has been received. If "nothing" gets selected it will be processed multiple times.
postProcessAction.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether attachments of emails should be downloaded. Only set if needed as it increases processing.

format.name: format

options.name: RAW
options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used

options.name: Resolved
options.description: Returns the full email with all data resolved and attachments saved as binary data

options.name: Simple
options.description: Returns the full email; do not use if you wish to gather inline attachments

format.description: The format to return the message in
format.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"
dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.ai_hint: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

options.name: options
customEmailConfig
options.description: Custom email fetching rules. See node-imap's search function for more details.

options.name: forceReconnect
options.description: Sets an interval (in minutes) to force a reconnection

options.name: trackLastMessageId
options.description: Whether to fetch only new emails since the last run, or all emails that match the "Custom Email Rules" (["UNSEEN"] by default)

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF format == 'simple' AND downloadAttachments == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName'
